summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Judicial Nominating Committee of the City of Dallas will convene on November 20, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The primary purpose of the meeting is to discuss and make recommendations regarding the appointment of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting held on June 25, 2024.
2. Executive session to deliberate on the possible appointment and employment of judges.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will consider recommendations from the Judicial Nominating Commission for filling the vacant positions of a full-time Municipal Judge and an Associate Judge. The meeting will be conducted both in-person and via video conference, ensuring public access through live broadcasting on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and online streaming.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks to approve the recommendations for the vacant judicial positions. Additionally, they will deliberate in executive session regarding the qualifications and potential candidates for these roles, adhering to the Texas Open Meetings Act provisions.

The meeting is open to public attendance, and participants are encouraged to follow the established rules of courtesy during the proceedings.
